profile.title: My Profile
profile.photoSupportFormat: We support PNG, JPEG and GIF under 10MB
profile.drawInstructions: Draw your signature in the area above
profile.verifyIdentityMsg: To change your email address, we need to verify your identity by entering your current password.
profile.otpSentMsg: A 6-digit verification code has been sent to your email.
profile.otpInstructions: Enter the 6-digit code sent to your new email address.
profile.nameRequirementsInfo: First name and last name must contain at least 3 letters, only alphabetic characters (no numbers or symbols). Avoid using a random name or special characters.
profile.passwordRequirementsInfo: Your password must be at least 6 characters long and include a combination of numbers, letters and special characters (!$@%).
profile.status2FADesc: Add an extra layer of security to your account when logging in.
profile.autosaveDesc: Enable autosave to never lose your data.
profile.logoutAllDesc: Log out of all other active sessions on devices other than this one.
profile.deleteAccountDesc: Permanently delete the account and remove access to all workspaces.
profile.confirmLogoutAllMsg: Enter your password to confirm logout
profile.transferOwnershipMsg: You must transfer ownership or delete these clinics before you can delete your account.
profile.confirmDeletionMsg: Enter your password to confirm deletion
profile.authenticatorInstructions: Each time you log in, in addition to your password, you'll use an authenticator app to generate a one-time code.
profile.scanQRInstructions: Scan the QR code below or manually enter the secret key into your authenticator app.
profile.enterOTPInstructions: Enter the 6-digit code you see in your authenticator app.
profile.disable2FAPasswordMsg: Please enter your password to continue.
profile.disable2FAOTPMsg: Please enter the verification code sent to your email.
profile.supportAccessDesc: Allow the technical team to temporarily access your account to assist you.
profile.profilePhotoInfo: Choose a clear profile photo with a neutral background and a clearly visible face.
